text: Hilary Cawthorne (born 31 December 1951) is a British fencer. She competed in the women's individual foil events at the 1976 and 1980 Summer Olympics. She is married to British Sabre Champion Jim Philbin. In 2013, she was appointed president of British Fencing. As Hilary Fredricke Cawthorne, she was appointed Member of the Order of the British Empire (MBE) in the 2017 New Year Honours for services to fencing. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:British female fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Great Britain Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Fencers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:People from Islington (district) Category:Sportspeople from London Category:Members of the Order of the British Empire
title: Hilary Cawthorne
